page.title: 11A Jubilee Celebration
page.content: 1985 marks the 75th anniversary of the foundation of the Guide and Brownie movement by Sir Baden Powell. This is a world wide{event}, which each{Brownie}and{Guide}pack will try to{commemorate}in their own way. In Wigtown, the Guides and Brownies managed to celebrate this event in numerous ways. These are some of the things which they did: a)75 bulbs were planted at the Church war memorial. b)75 good deeds were done by the Brownie pack. c)75 squares were knitted for Newton Stewart hospital. d)75 invitations were given out for the special bonfire party, at which a cake was divided into 75 pieces. e)A special Church service was held Penningham St. John's for all the Guides and Brownies in Wigtownshire.
